Directions: In a Dutch oven or large saucepan, cook beef and sausage over medium heat until no longer pink; drain and set aside.
Drain tomatoes, reserving the juice; set tomatoes aside. In the same pan, combine the peppers, celery, onion and reserved juice. Cover and cook over medium heat for 10 minutes.
Add the meat, tomatoes, zucchini, tomato juice and seasonings. Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until zucchini is tender, stirring occasionally. Garnish with cheese if desired.
Ingredients: 2 medium green bell peppers, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
6 medium zucchini, halved and cut into 1/2-inch slices
